about_the_game:
HOLD IT!

The soundtrack of The Great Ace Attorney: Adventures makes its grand debut in the West!

Immerse yourself in the orchestra-infused tension and excitement of 19th-century London & Japan courtroom battles with this 67-track album composed by Yasumasa Kitagawa and Hiromitsu Maeba.

The soundtrack has been reauthored from the original, high quality source material. Formats include MP3 (V0), FLAC (16-bit), and AAC (VBR).
